## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G32090](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G32090)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>GLXI-like;9</u>
- **Gene Name:** Glyoxalase I-Like;9
- **Description:**   Lactoylglutathione lyase / glyoxalase I family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2045482
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
